snippet: BP has agreed to sell stakes in a group of oil fields in the Gulf of Mexico to the Plains Exploration and Production Company of Houston for about $5.6 billion.
abstract: BP has agreed to sell stakes in a group of oil fields in the Gulf of Mexico to the Plains Exploration and Production Company of Houston for about $5.6 billion.

headline.main: BP to Sell Oil Assets in Gulf of Mexico for $5.6 Billion
headline.print_headline: As BP Refocuses, It Sells Gulf Assets for $5.6 Billion
